sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STÆHELINA, in botany : A genus of plants belonging to the claſs of ſyngenſia, and order of polygamia aqualis ; and in the natural ſyſtem arranged under the 49th order, Compositae. The receptacle is paleaceous, the chaff being very ſhort ; the pappus is branchy, and the antheræ caudated. There are eight ſpecies, the gnaphaloides, dubia, arboreſcens, fruticosa, ilicifolia, corymboſa, chamæpeuce, and imbricata.
